connectionDetails.undetectable: Хэрэв та хөтөч дээр дуудлага хийх боломжгүй хэвээр байгаа бол чанга яригч, микрофон, камераа зөв тохируулсан эсэх, хөтөчдөө микрофон, камераа ашиглах эрх олгосон эсэх, хөтчийн хувилбар нь шинэчлэгдсэн байхыг зөвлөж байна. өнөөдрийг хүртэл. toolbar.noisyAudioInputDesc: Таны микрофон шуугиантай байна！Та микрофоноо солих эсвэл дууг нь хаана уу.

transcribing.error: Орчуулга амжилтгүй боллоо. Дахин оролдоно уу.
transcribing.pending: Хурлын хадмал орчуулга хийхэд бэлдэж байна...

videoSIPGW.busy: We're working on freeing resources. Please try again in a few minutes.
videoSIPGW.busyTitle: The Room service is currently busy
videoSIPGW.errorInvite: Conference not established yet. Please try again later.
videoSIPGW.errorInviteFailed: We're working on resolving the issue. Please try again later.

videoStatus.audioOnlyExpanded: Таны дамжуулах чадвар муу байна. Энэ горимд та зөвхөн аудио болон дэлгэцийн хуваалцахыг хүлээн авах боломжтой.

welcomepage.appDescription: Go ahead, video chat with the whole team. In fact, invite everyone you know. {{app}} is a fully encrypted, 100% open source video conferencing solution that you can use all day, every day, for free — with no account needed.
welcomepage.connectCalendarText: Connect your calendar to view all your meetings in {{app}}. Plus, add {{provider}} meetings to your calendar and start them with one click.
welcomepage.jitsiOnMobile: Jitsi on mobile – download our apps and start a meeting from anywhere
welcomepage.moderatedMessage: Or book a meeting URL in advance where you are the only moderator.
welcomepage.recentListEmpty: Та өмнө нь хурал зохион байгуулж байгаагүй юм байна
welcomepage.roomNameAllowedChars: Хурлын нэр дараах тэмдэгтүүдийг агуулж болохгүй: ?, &, :, ', ", %, #.
welcomepage.roomnameHint: Та өрөөний нэр эсвэл холбоосыг оруулна уу
welcomepage.title: Аюулгүй бөгөөд өндөр чанартай видео хурал хийх боломжтой

lobby.backToKnockModeButton: No password, ask to join instead
lobby.disableDialogContent: Lobby mode is currently enabled. This feature ensures that unwanted participants can't join your meeting. Do you want to disable it?
lobby.enableDialogText: Lobby mode lets you protect your meeting by only allowing people to enter after a formal approval by a moderator.
lobby.joiningMessage: You'll join the meeting as soon as someone accepts your request
lobby.joinWithPasswordMessage: Trying to join with password, please wait...
lobby.joinRejectedMessage: Your join request was rejected by a moderator.
lobby.knockTitle: Someone wants to join the meeting
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessDenied: {{targetParticipantName}} has been rejected to join by {{originParticipantName}}
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessGranted: {{targetParticipantName}} has been allowed to join by {{originParticipantName}}
